mapper.select:
select count(*) from UNSPEAKER u,PLAYER p where u.PLAYER_ID = p.ID
and ( p.ID like '${searchValue}%' or p.`NAME` like '${searchValue}%' or p.`USER_NAME` like '${searchValue}%' )
mapper.insert:
SELECT @@IDENTITY AS ID
insert into UNSPEAKER
ID,
PLAYER_ID,
CREATE_TIME,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{playerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mapper.update:
update UNSPEAKER
PLAYER_ID = #{playerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
